pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Adaptive Metropolis Algorithm // Function for adapting the shape of the random walk Metropolis proposal as specified by robust adaptive Metropolis algorithm by Vihola (2012) DOI:10.1007/s11222-011-9269-5. Package also includes fast functions for rank-one Cholesky update and downdate. These functions can be used directly from R or the corresponding C++ header files can be easily linked to other R packages.
